About.Hours & facilities: Open Mon-Thurs 9am-5pm. General reference assistance and photocopying available.

About.Access: Advance notice should be given for a visit to the archive with an indication of the purpose of the research. Proof of identity is required. Access to records not normally available for research can be gained with written permission from the Headmaster.

About.Acquisition focus: The records of Christ Church Grammar School and its associated bodies.
